referencecode_text: Please complete the code that you received from the accommodation service
requires:
The safeIn application requires:
1. INTERNET access,
2. LOCATION service enabled.
Please ensure that you have internet access before continuing to the next screen
verification_header: Complete and send the details for verification
digit_val: Cannot send! The field must be 10 digits long
code_label: Enter the code provided by the booker
no_auth: Verification failed, please check the given code, or try a different code.
no_internet: Check internet connectivity and try again.
confirmation_content: You are connected with your accommodation and can send for help!
messagesent_confirmation_content: Please wait for the next steps of your accommodation service!
alert_mobiledata_enabled_title: Thanks, Mobile data used for Internet
alert_mobiledata_enabled_content: !!!Always ensure connectivity to work safeIn as expected
alert_wifi_enabled_content: !!!Always ensure connectivity to work safeIn as expected
internet_alert_content: The application needs an internet connection to send email to the recipient as described to the app full description. Please enable the connection using WiFi or mobile data
location_alert_content: This app needs to enable and use Location features to find you easily. Please enable location services in the settings or privacy panel
medical_help_title: Use below button to request help for medical reasons
car_help_title: Use below button to request help related with the car
lost_help_title: Use below button if you are lost
